playn.core.gl
Class AbstractCanvasGL<GC>

java.lang.Object
  playn.core.gl.AbstractCanvasGL<GC>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Canvas
public abstract class AbstractCanvasGL<GC>
extends Object
implements Canvas

A base class for Canvas implementations for GL backends. This mainly takes care of drawing images, but also provides a dirty tracking mechanism, since nearly all canvas implementations need one.

drawImageCentered

public Canvas drawImageCentered(Image img,
                                float x,
                                float y)
Description copied from interface: Canvas
Draws an image, centered at the specified location. Simply subtracts image.width/2 from dx and image.height/2 from dy.
